aiFreightHub.title: AI Freight Hub - RnD Hub
aiFreightHub.description: Complete automation system for the American trucking world with AI for automatic search and quotation, sending hundreds of emails daily.
aiFreightHub.longDescription: Developed for RnD Hub, this revolutionary automation system uses AI for automatic search and quotation in the American freight sector. The platform automatically manages hundreds of emails daily, serving dozens of clients in the US freight market. The system includes intelligent matching algorithms, complete quotation process automation and advanced client management.

thinkGoodWebsite.title: ThinkGood Music - Website
thinkGoodWebsite.description: Modern and responsive website for ThinkGood Music, with elegant design and advanced features for music event management.
thinkGoodWebsite.longDescription: Development of a modern and responsive website for ThinkGood Music, with elegant design that reflects the brand identity. The site includes advanced features like event gallery, booking system and social media integration. Particularly curated events section with interactive timeline and integrated booking system.

thinkGoodChatbot.title: ThinkGood Music - Lead Generation Chatbot
thinkGoodChatbot.description: Advanced AI chatbot for automatic lead generation on site with 30k monthly visits, converting traffic into qualified leads through intelligent conversations.
thinkGoodChatbot.longDescription: Development of an advanced AI chatbot for ThinkGood Music, site with 30k monthly visits. The system automatically converts web traffic into qualified leads through intelligent and personalized conversations. The chatbot includes lead scoring, CRM integration and advanced analytics to continuously optimize conversions.

thresholdWebsite.title: Threshold Coach - Web Platform
thresholdWebsite.description: Complete web platform developed from scratch for personalized coaching, with modern architecture and advanced user interface.
thresholdWebsite.longDescription: Complete web platform developed entirely by WebBitz for Threshold Coach. The project includes frontend and backend development from scratch, specifically following client requirements. The platform offers a modern user experience with customizable dashboards, advanced user management and integration with international payment systems.

thresholdAI.title: Threshold Coach - 50 AI Assistants
thresholdAI.description: Development of nearly 50 specialized AI assistants with OpenAI/Anthropic toggle for personalized coaching and user support.
thresholdAI.longDescription: Development of a complete ecosystem of nearly 50 specialized AI assistants for Threshold Coach. Each assistant is optimized for specific coaching areas with the ability to switch between OpenAI and Anthropic. The system includes advanced conversation management, AI personalization for each user and detailed interaction analytics.

thresholdDatabase.title: Threshold Coach - Database Infrastructure
thresholdDatabase.description: Enterprise database infrastructure to manage all user conversations with nearly 50 AI assistants, with scalable and secure architecture.
thresholdDatabase.longDescription: Design and implementation of enterprise database infrastructure for Threshold Coach. The system manages all user conversations with nearly 50 AI assistants, ensuring scalability, security and high performance. Includes automatic backups, replication, query optimization and advanced monitoring.

welpyChatbot.title: Welpy - Lead Generation Chatbot
welpyChatbot.description: Advanced AI chatbot for automatic lead generation on site with 40k monthly visits, converting traffic into qualified leads through intelligent conversations.
welpyChatbot.longDescription: Development of an advanced AI chatbot for Welpy, important site with 40k monthly visits. The system automatically converts web traffic into qualified leads through intelligent and personalized conversations. The chatbot includes lead scoring, CRM integration and advanced analytics to continuously optimize conversions.

admissionHub.title: The Admission Hub - Complete Platform
admissionHub.description: Complete web platform developed from scratch for university admission services, with candidate management system and advanced dashboards.
admissionHub.longDescription: Complete development from scratch of The Admission Hub, platform specialized in university admission services. The project includes frontend and backend development, candidate management system, consultant dashboards, payment system and complete admission process tracking.

vistamare.title: Vistamare - Website
vistamare.description: Modern and responsive website for Vistamare, with elegant design and advanced features.
vistamare.longDescription: Development of a modern and responsive website for Vistamare, with elegant design that reflects the brand identity. The site includes advanced features like image gallery, booking system and social media integration.

area287Website.title: Area287 - Website
area287Website.description: Website for a street clothing store in Pontedera
area287Website.longDescription: Development of a complete website for Area287, street clothing store in Pontedera. The site presents the brand through a modern and engaging design, with sections dedicated to the store's history, collections and special initiatives.

area287Ecommerce.title: Area287 - E-Commerce
area287Ecommerce.description: E-Commerce for a street clothing store in Pontedera
area287Ecommerce.longDescription: Development of a complete e-commerce for Area287, street clothing store in Pontedera. The platform includes product catalog, secure payment system, order management and Shopify integration for optimal inventory management.

fantozziBarWebsite.title: Fantozzi Bar - Website
fantozziBarWebsite.description: Showcase website to tell the story of the historic Fantozzi bar in Pontedera, with online booking functionality via Pienissimo
fantozziBarWebsite.longDescription: Development of a showcase website for Bar Fantozzi, historic venue in Pontedera. The site tells the bar's story through engaging images and content, with integration of the Pienissimo online booking system to allow customers to book tables directly from the website.

ristoroAnticaScuderiaWebsite.title: Ristoro Antica Scuderia - Website
ristoroAnticaScuderiaWebsite.description: Luxury website for the gourmet restaurant Antica Scuderia, nestled in the Chianti hills between Florence and Siena
ristoroAnticaScuderiaWebsite.longDescription: Development of an elegant and refined website for Ristoro L'Antica Scuderia, a fine dining restaurant located in the heart of Chianti. The site reflects the exclusive atmosphere of the venue, with sophisticated design that enhances the Tuscan culinary tradition and the luxury gastronomic experience offered by the restaurant.

bottegaScuderiaWebsite.title: La Bottega della Scuderia - Website
bottegaScuderiaWebsite.description: Luxury website for the gourmet boutique of Scuderia, specialized in exclusive culinary experiences and high-quality products
bottegaScuderiaWebsite.longDescription: Development of an elegant and refined website for La Bottega della Scuderia, luxury gourmet space that offers exclusive culinary experiences, premium wine tastings and high-quality artisanal products. The site reflects the exclusive atmosphere of the boutique, with sophisticated design that enhances the premium gastronomic experience and selected products.

bagnoParadisoWebsite.title: Bagno Paradiso - Website
bagnoParadisoWebsite.description: Showcase website for Bagno Paradiso in Tirrenia, beach establishment with premium services and marine atmosphere
bagnoParadisoWebsite.longDescription: Development of a modern and attractive website for Bagno Paradiso in Tirrenia, beach establishment that offers premium services on the Tuscan coast. The site captures the marine and relaxing atmosphere of the establishment, with fresh design and colors that evoke the sea, enhancing the services offered and the quality beach experience.

napoliIntoCoreWebsite.title: Napoli Into Core - Website
napoliIntoCoreWebsite.description: Website for room booking in Naples with integrated booking system and complete accommodation management
napoliIntoCoreWebsite.longDescription: Development of a professional website for Napoli Into Core, accommodation facility in the heart of Naples that offers a complete and intuitive booking system. The site allows customers to easily book rooms, view real-time availability and manage their bookings, with modern design that enhances the beauty of the Neapolitan city.

spicchioDiLunaWebsite.title: Spicchio Di Luna - Website
spicchioDiLunaWebsite.description: Showcase website for Spicchio Di Luna pizzeria, with digital menu and authentic gastronomic atmosphere
spicchioDiLunaWebsite.longDescription: Development of an attractive website for Spicchio Di Luna pizzeria, venue that brings Italian culinary tradition to the heart of the city. The site captures the warm and familiar atmosphere of the pizzeria, with modern design that enhances traditional dishes, interactive digital menu and authentic gastronomic experience offered by the venue.

diazMicrotorrefazioneWebsite.title: Diaz Microtorrefazione - Website
diazMicrotorrefazioneWebsite.description: Website for Diaz Microtorrefazione, specialized in artisanal coffee roasting of high quality
diazMicrotorrefazioneWebsite.longDescription: Development of a complete website for Diaz Microtorrefazione, artisanal micro-roastery that tells the passion for quality coffee. The site presents the company's story, artisanal roasting processes and different coffee varieties, with an elegant design that enhances craftsmanship and tradition.

diazMicrotorrefazioneEcommerce.title: Diaz Microtorrefazione - E-Commerce
diazMicrotorrefazioneEcommerce.description: E-commerce website for Diaz Microtorrefazione, specialized in artisanal coffee roasting of high quality
diazMicrotorrefazioneEcommerce.longDescription: Development of a complete e-commerce for Diaz Microtorrefazione, artisanal micro-roastery that brings the passion for quality coffee directly to consumers. The site offers an elegant and intuitive shopping experience, with detailed product catalog, secure payment system and complete order management, enhancing the craftsmanship and quality of products.
